TopicTitle: Is this just me? - Mk3 IVAs are completely black.

Articles.Content:
Help!

The title says it all, basically. I just downloaded a fresh 0.90 install and the new Mk3 cockpit IVAs are completely black. Everything else is working properly. Pressing "V" will (maybe) still toggle between the Kerbals' views inside, but, of course, there's no view to be had. I'm no tech expert, so I have no idea what's causing this, and whether or not others are experiencing it. Can y'all please take a moment to check your Mk3 cockpits' IVA screens?

Every single other cockpit has the proper IVA, so far as I've checked (I have yet to look at the IVA for the Cupola or the Mk2 cockpits).

Thanks for the help.

-Upsilon
As it says in the readme / changelog, the Mk3 cockpit does not currently have an IVA and it's just a blank space.

As it says in the readme / changelog, the Mk3 cockpit does not currently have an IVA and it's just a blank space.

Dang. Sorry for not checking this.

Ah, I wish that the Mk3 cockpit had an IVA mode. Instead, all I got was a dramatically improved gameplay experience overall. Nuts.
It should also mention in the part description for the Mk3 cockpit that the IVA is currently in shipping.

Me too i made a space shuttle and i can't look at iva for the cockpit

NEED HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

There is no help, only darkness.....

Ahem, the IVA ain't done yet as Ted stated
It's all right. Now I can pretend that I'm inside a black hole! Like that guy in Interstellar!
